text: Ra jaba unisita bhanincha ki, ‘‘juna jivika timila'i allahale di'ekocha, tyasamadhyebata kehi (dana) kharca gara.’’ Ta yi kaphiraharu mominaharusita bhandachanh ki ‘‘hamile ti manisaharula'i kina khuva'une, jasala'i yadi allahale caheko bha'e svayam khuva'idinthyo? Timi ta spasta bhulama chau.’’
